author: leeastley
title: Manchester United transfer news: Luke Shaw’s agent denies reports Jose Mourinho wants to sell the England international
text:
EFL Shaw's a stayer Manchester United transfer news: Luke Shaw’s agent denies reports Jose Mourinho wants to sell the England international 
The former Southampton defender has fallen out of favour with boss Jose Mourinho and it was reported he was willing to let him go this month By LEE ASTLEY
